description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员，曾任第十三届全国人民代表大会解放军和武警部队代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a member of the Communist Party of China, who served as a delegate of the People's Liberation Army and People's Armed Police Force to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河北省秦皇岛市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Qinhuangdao, Hebei, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，通常简称为“中国”。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th national legislature of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军和中国人民武装警察部队代表团

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军和中国人民武装警察部队代表团
en: Delegation of the People's Liberation Army and the People's Armed Police Force

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会的代表团之一。
description.en: One of the delegations to the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.
Song Chunli is from Changli, Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 宋春雳的国籍是中华人民共和国。
description.en: Song Chunli's nationality is the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 宋春雳是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Song Chunli is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，宋春雳被选为第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 2018, Song Chunli was elected as a delegate to the 13th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军和中国人民武装警察部队代表团

description.zh-cn: 宋春雳作为解放军和武警部队代表团的成员出席第十三届全国人民代表大会。
description.en: Song Chunli attended the 13th National People's Congress as a member of the Delegation of the People's Liberation Army and the People's Armed Police Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军和中国人民武装警察部队代表团
relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军和中国人民武装警察部队代表团是第十三届全国人民代表大会的组成部分。
description.en: The Delegation of the People's Liberation Army and the People's Armed Police Force is a component of the 13th National People's Congress.
